sub_title: BDM based in NL, leading Aetina EMEA Team
summary: I have worked in the IPC industry and peripherals related purchasing and system integration for last 8 years, including 5 years management experience in business Operations and Business unit. Internally, I am a business oriented personnel and committed proactive attitude during my work. Externally, I am a true relationship builder with excellent communication skills.

Leading the Aetina EMEA Team for business growth and daily operation. 
Manage and generate revenue in terms of turnover based on company goals.

Support development of strategies and ideas to assist business growth. 
Support execution of business plans

company.name: AAEON Europe | Innovative AI Edge Computing Provider

profile_positions.company: AAEON Europe | Innovative AI Edge Computing Provider
profile_positions.description:
As the Business Unit Manager of EP& UP, i am leading the Operations of 2 of total 6 business units in the company . I am responsible for the achievement of the revenue targets, continuously improve the product portfolio and processes, and determine the long-term strategy for the department. meanwhile focus on the development of the team ( 5 stakeholders) and motivating, coaching and development of the employees in the department.

Accountable for output according to revenue quota targets in annual business plan.

Growing AAEON's UP business and Customization Service (CSC) though in the development of new solutuon oriented to the industrial IOT & AI, IIOT, M2M, other computer Peripherals design, validation and development by comply with Quality and lean principles.

Development of long term strategy for BU Operations thrive. Identifies and develops resource, suppliers, distributors and direct key account customers through coaching, collaboration and creating eco system partnership. Encourages and leading the HQ R&D to support them for continuous improvements. Sponsor of (technical ODM) projects: provides direction, supplier resource and project management support. 

Accountable for compliance and alignment with financial department for business planning, budget and financial reporting. Active participation in return on investment principle, sharing and deployment of best practices.
profile_positions.title: EP&UP Business Unit Manager

profile_positions.company: AAEON Europe | Innovative AI Edge Computing Provider
profile_positions.description:
Creating best-in-class Peripheral product portfolio internally, aim to support new business in IOT, AI and IPC industry. 
Continuously undertake market research and benchmarking in order to benefit from new trends in the global supplier market, involve suppliers as early as possible into the development process. 
Involve in the development process for new products or customer project from an early stage, provide business proposal, aim to offer the reliable quality product with competitive price. 
Source, introduce and manage a range of suppliers in Europe and Globally. Conducting regular visits to suppliers, growers and processors to become an expert in the product area and ensure delivery of continuous improvement.Supporting the Purchasing team and PSM team on projects as required.
Building relationships and strengthening communication with internal and external stakeholders
profile_positions.title: EP Business Unit Manager

profile_positions.company: AAEON Europe | Innovative AI Edge Computing Provider
profile_positions.description:
Head of Business Operation. Manage Purchasing, Supply Chain (including AEU local assembly line), Logistic & Warehouse and Regional Sales support team. Direct manage team leader from 4 departments and guide them to complete their individual tasks in order to achieve company target.
Lead the cross-functional team to ensure correct prioritization of business to ensure overall company objectives, customer’s satisfaction and cost effectives are met. Assuring productivity and efficiency while optimize the workflow.
profile_positions.title: Operations Manager

profile_positions.company: AAEON Europe | Innovative AI Edge Computing Provider
profile_positions.description:
I am responsible for a team of 3 to meet order fulfillment on non-AAEON items (Peripherals). Analyze daily issues and take correct action to meet the requested orders from sales. Identify potential suppliers and selecting strategic suppliers and carry out contract negociations. Focus on quality,price and reliabiity of the products.

Communication with sales to get forecasts of each product group, define, source , promote and maintain P-trade items. In daily base, manage suppliers on the operational level, so the proper priorities can be set.

Product portfolio including DRAM/SSD/CPU/Cooler/Chassis/M2M modules/power supply and Mini PC

I am responsible to meet order fulfillment. Analyze daily issues and take correct action to meet the requested orders from sales.

Part number and BOM creation and management in ERP.

profile_positions.company: AAEON Europe | Innovative AI Edge Computing Provider
profile_positions.description:

I am also involved in the development process of new products/projects from an early stage and i am the link between external suppliers and internal customers ( PM and Sales).

profile_positions.description:
RMA Receiving & Shipping & Logistic control
Make visual control , process control and data control for all RMA cases.
Complete special projects and tenders as requested. Support AEU marketing teams and RMA group for cases with international forwarder such as TNT, FedEx, Panalpina and DB Schenker.
profile_positions.title: RMA Group Controller

profile_positions.description:
Work in EDCO's Purchasing department of category Tools.A challenging work.  
I learned 13 steps of inport purchasing including make quotation,comparing the price and property, keep in touch with supplier, make desk research for Purchaser in order to get ready for the trade fair all around the world.

Evaluate all purchase acquisitions and purchase orders on regular basis and develop implementation strategies for all programs and provide optimal level of customer services and prepare all reports to identify cost cutting initiatives.                       

Manage and distribute all site condition reports for all budget processes and administer all vendor requests and ensure compliance to all purchasing guidelines and perform cost analysis on all procedures and prepare required reports. 

Design all purchase orders for all stock and non stock items and ensure timely delivery of all products and administer all supplier performance and facilitate corrective actions as required. 

Analyze all supplier invoices and evaluate it with all quantity received and manage inventory of all items and recommend elimination of all out of stocks and develop all purchase orders and assign appropriate purchase order for same. 

Maintain records of all purchase order and associate documents for all processes and maintain knowledge on all open order and its status and provide assistance to all purchasing staff and manage all calls for purchasing and delivery schedule. 

Monitor all rates of production on everyday basis and coordinate with supplier and production unit to introduce new projects and ensure achieve of all support service objectives to facilitate sales and develop appropriate sourcing strategy. 

Analyze all capacity associate issues and resolve same for all special projects and review all supplier quotations with help of purchasing techniques and organize related procurement activities.
profile_positions.title: Inkoop assistent (Purchasing Assistant)

profile_positions.description: To be a junior consultant, I worked for Lely industries NV in the Netherlands to investigated the possibilities to sell the dairy equipment( Milking Robot A4) to Brazil. The Proposal including Macro analysis(DESTEP,SWOT),industry analysis,market targeting,competition,strategic and tactical,In the final, the conclusion and recommodation has been used as a basis for exporting steps which is towards the promising Brazilian dairy market.
